EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell 2020 Pricing Catalogs Available This Tuesday, October 1
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Dear Customer,
The 2020 published Commercial Spares and BGA & D&S Universal Flat Rate pricing catalogs will be available October 1, 2019 on Honeywell’s MyAerospace <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/parts-and-repairs/downloads/pricing-catalogs]]> portal.
Key Information:
- 2020 downloadable catalogs <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/parts-and-repairs/downloads/pricing-catalogs]]> will be available on MyAerospace.com October 1, 2019. - The pricing in the 2020 catalogs is effective January 1, 2020. - 2020 pricing will be reflected when searching for parts or placing orders on MyAerospace Online Ordering <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/account/login?returnUrl=%2FRedirects%2FSSO%2Fonline-ordering]]> beginning on January 1, 2020. - Download the 2020 catalogs and update any internal systems to reflect the 2020 catalog pricing. - Failure to update your system/POs with updated pricing could result in shipment delays. - Note that this does not apply to contractual pricing.
Why Use MyAerospace:
- Easy access with 24/7 availability. - Use the MyAerospace <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/account/login?returnUrl=%2FRedirects%2FSSO%2Fonline-ordering]]> portal for your order management needs. Including: Quoting, Ordering and Order Status. - Periodically monitor the order status dashboard to view orders ‘on hold’ for price discrepancy or missing data. - At the same location, you can also sign up for catalog change notifications. This sends an email when any of your pricing catalogs are modified. - Need help? View MyAerospace updates and tutorials. <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/contact-us/myaerospace-training]]>
Thank you for your cooperation in updating your systems to reflect 2020 pricing. Please submit any questions <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/contact-us]]> through MyAerospace or contact your Honeywell Customer Support Representative.
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Visit MyAerospace <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
